Description.Name: Inheritor
Description.Details: It belonged in a museum but now it's yours. Quirk: Lucky&Noble. Mech: Random Rare Mech.

OptionDescription: It may have been years since you last spoke to your great-uncle but you must have left an impression or you were simply the only one left in the family. While his passing didn't leave you with his money; it did leave you with some information on his business contacts, his prized 'Mech freshly pulled out of mothballs, and a request to make a name for yourself.
Intro:
After some training and a lot of networking, you found yourself on the outskirts of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganReach],Aurigan Reach]], where your most recent contract went horribly wrong. Raju happened to be visiting the planet and picked up your distress call. Upon rescuing you, he offered you a job in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseArano],House Arano]] Royal Guard.

So it is that you find yourself reunited with your old mentor, preparing your ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] for guard duty on the coronation day of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKameaArano],Lady Kamea Arano]]â€¦
BioDescription: You took to plying yourself as a mercenary and found yourself traveling the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]]. While you're not the best pilot, you've been lucky enough to make it this far and a gift from a distant relative might prove to be the break you were looking for.
